title: TRAILER: The Longest Game
description:
From 30 for 30 Podcasts, The Longest Game tells the story of a surreal baseball game, a record-breaking 33 innings. As they slug it out from dusk to dawn, the teams make history. Full episode available August 23, 2022. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: The Longest Game
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPN Films, 30for30
itunes:subtitle: Podcast documentary about the longest game in professional baseball history, a surreal 33 innings.
